column1: #Text=Teo says : " The wind will carry you .
#Text=I think I was born without that something .
#Text=" Teo says : " Yeah , I suppose it is .
#Text=" Aang says : " Just make sure you keep your mouth closed so you do n't swallow a bug !
#Text=" Katara says : " Teo was right about the air .
#Text=All I had to do was trust it , let it carry me .
#Text=" Aang says : " Even though Teo 's not an airbender , he really does have the spirit of one !
#Text=If you want to see what 's in that room , I 'd be happy to open the door for you .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " I said do n't touch anything !
#Text=That experiment 's old , and that egg was just part of last week 's lunch .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Quick , find that egg !
#Text=" Teo says : " I ca n't believe I 'm finally going to see what 's inside !
#Text=" Sokka says : " How can something so small that you ca n't even see it make such a big stink !?
#Text=" Mechanist says : " That 's the solution to our problem !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah ... if we put a whole mess of rotten eggs in the cellar where the gas seeps up ... " Mechanist says : " ... The gas will mix with the smell of rotten eggs !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then , if there 's a leak ... " Mechanist says : " ... You smell rotten eggs !
#Text=Then , you just follow your nose to the place where the smell is coming from ... " Sokka says : " And plug up the hole where the gas is escaping !
#Text=" Aang says : " This is a nightmare .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " You do n't understand !
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're making weapons for the Fire Nation !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You make weapons for the Fire Nation ?!
#Text=" Mechanist says : " It was about a year after we moved here .
#Text=You were too young to remember this , Teo .
#Text=I pleaded with them , I begged them to spare us !
#Text=They asked what I had to offer .
